Text: Can you give more of a description on what this is?

It's used to try and induce lucid dreaming. Anecdotal evidence suggests that isochronic tones help induce lucid dreaming. Thus, I have an alarm in the MP3 that plays to wake one up after some time asleep, and then play isochronic tones after sleep is attained once more.
Oh.. cool, I've been getting into Isochronic tones lately, and Have been a huge fan of lucidity for quite sum time
